reviews.text: We made an order at OSAMA Sushi www.osama.com.ua for Osama's set, you can look at the photo of how he looks on their website and in Instagram of paid bloggers, and what they brought us. Of course, first the money was opened at home. Still packed, it smelled very fishy when opened, instead of salmon-tuna it smelled so bad, it is not included in the sets. There is no unagi sauce and mayonnaise as in the photo. As the admin said, this is only for Instagram and bloggers. And for ordinary customers, they do it differently)))) it just killed. That's what Photoshop says). It was possible to go to a store and buy mayonnaise)))))) if they have problems with this). and this is how this fraud turns out, people are misled... They didn't even eat that set, because it looked and smelled. The administrator proved for a long time that it is not their fault that the photo is one thing, but in life it is another. I agreed to change it to a new one and bring it. Well ok, I say let's go. The driver brought, I gave them the set that was not eaten. I go into the house, open it, and everything is the same there))))))))) only instead of tuna, salmon, which should have been from the very beginning. But as we can see, they don't have unagi sauce and mayonnaise again))))))))) it's just tin. And there are a lot of paid bloggers in Instagram, with sets with sauces and everything is so beautiful. I will not order from here again and will not advise anyone. You pay for one thing, they bring another. Video and photo in the attachment, look at this beauty and compare how they are on Instagram. I didn't think that it would be possible to break through the bottom after Sushiya, but Osama did it). I have everything.

Osama, thank you for spoiling the evening, mood and well-being. I have repeatedly ordered sushi right here (as if it was more or less). Today made me understand that it cannot be consumed. I always order the same set - but I did not expect this. There was still nothing clear about the smell, but after taking it into the mouth, the taste was like (a person went to the toilet - wiped himself with his hand and held it with his hand when cutting a roll, or maybe it was cooking. It made me sick 🤢 🤮 . The rice was dry, nothing could be kept, it was even laid out not neat. This time there were none of the positives, unfortunately. After analyzing Google reviews, you can understand that it is impossible to consume, they do not respond to negative reviews and do not pay attention, the management is silent - instead of solving many questions that bother customers. I am also attaching a photo to show in which form I received it and which could not be eaten (a whole roll in the trash)🤝

Happy New Year !!!
Osama, as always, is on our New Year's table and not only, not a single feast is complete without your sushi))) We have eaten in many places before, but on Pobeda Avenue the most delicious sushi, and we often see that there is an influx of orders, but this is not surprising, it’s really tasty and not expensive, so we are willing to wait during peak hours. Special thanks to the Administrator for his communication skills and attentiveness to us as regular customers!

I took the chef's set 50 on 50 + spicy roll.
They delivered on time... And... that's all the positives. After Osama from Bila Tserkva, Kyiv Osama is just trash. They took it from a point on the Minsk massif, but I am writing here because there is no such point on the map.
1. Roles fall apart. They don't just fall apart in the sauce, but you just take them dry and they just fall apart like a salad, forming a bowl of rice from the plate
2. Bloody sushi, the ingredients are very old and you can feel it - the avocado is very dark, the mango is very sour.
3. Ginger is just trash, not very tasty
4. Stuffing... did you mean rice? It's not a roll, it's a huge piece of rice and a dollop of filling, compared to the delicious giants from Osama bts, it's just garbage.
5. Spicy roll norm, probably the only norm roll, but not super wow and also falls apart on the go
6. They put four pieces, one from almost each roll (one of the examples in the photo) - almost without anything, that is, the end of the roll
7. The fish is not ice, not high, but as if it is not rotten, thank you for that.

If the chefs have the task of feeding people with worms, they managed to get all 5 stars, the sushi is good and big, you can't argue, but the presence of worms in the rolls is confusing, we took the osama set for the evening, ate half of it and the wife decided to look at the roll, and there was a fish with slime where there were worms and such a roll is not the only one, now we will add the price of medicines to the price of the set so that there is no poisoning, but they make discounts for birthdays, they are pleasant in communication, there are no questions about service, but there are questions about suppliers and cooks
